IDBFactoryDatabases.summary: The databases method of the interface returns a {{jsxref("Promise")}} that fulfills with an array of objects containing the name and version of all the available databases.

remarks.para: This is a snapshot of the databases, intended primarily to allow web applications to check what databases have been created â€” in order to, for example, clean up databases created by earlier versions of application code.

IDBFactoryDatabases.returns: A that fulfills with an array of objects representing a snapshot of the available databases (or rejects with the error/exceptions below).Each array object has the following properties:Note that the sequence on the returned objects is undefined.
